Description.Name: What's in a Name?
Description.Details:
Arriving at Medical Facilities to check on your mystery guest, you stroll through the doorway and approach one of the MedTechs seated at a terminal, "Hey there... MedTech Anderson," you say as you look at the Techs name badge, "Which bed did the [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] get assigned?"

The MedTech starts to give a smart-assed answer as he looks up and notices who you are, and promptly changes his tune, "Do I look like a... Umm, ohh... Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}... uhhh Let me... uhh... look that up for you sir.  That would be Bed MB2-06, sir."

You nod your thanks and head over to MedBay Two and over to Bed MB2-06.  A pair of MedTechs are checking the diagnostic panel showing the vitals of the mystery patient.  One of them notices you standing at the end of the bed, "Commander, nothing much has changed since they were brought in."

You look at the screens, unable to make any sense of the data shown, "How long do you think they will remain in this state?"

The MedTech points at their partner and responds, "With both of us monitoring them here in MedBay Two, it could be four to six weeks before we can safely wake them from thier comatose state."

Description.Name: switch to Basic Medical Care
Description.Details: [approximately 8 weeks recovery]

Description.Name: Basic Medical
Description.Details:
You weigh up the current costs against spending more money on additional medical care before deciding to save some money on an unknown outcome, "Hate to say, but we need to keep MedBay Two available for our active duty personel.  Move our guest to MedBay One and alert me to any changes to their condition, good or bad, clear?"

The MedTech nods and makes a note in the patient's file and they start prepping to move them to MedBay One, "Understood, Commander."

<color=#E62E00>[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] estimated time comatose: approximately 6-8 Weeks</color>

Description.Name: Remain at Bronze Tier Medical Care
Description.Details: [4-6 weeks recovery]

Description.Name: Bronze Medical
Description.Details:

The MedTech nods and makes a note in the patient's file, "Understood, Commander."

Description.Name: Upgrade to Silver Tier Medical Care
Description.Details: up to [¢150000] [3-4 weeks recovery]

Description.Name: Silver Medical
Description.Details:
Your curiousity gets the better of you as you stand there looking at this unknown MechWarrior, "Is the patient stable enough to move?"

The MedTech looks at you curiously, "Of course, Commander, provided it is not a long journey."

You nod, "Okay, let's get them moved to MedBay Three, pronto.  Hopefully that will speed up their recovery and we can find out just who they are."

The MedTech activates the call button to summon a pair of orderlies to assist with the transfer, "I'll get the patient situated in MedBay Three and alert you to any changes to their condition."

<color=#E62E00>[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] estimated time comatose: approximately 3-4 weeks</color>

Description.Name: Upgrade to Gold Tier Medical Care
Description.Details: up to [¢250000] [1-2 weeks recovery]

Description.Name: Gold Medical
Description.Details:
You look at the comatose patient lying there on the bed and can't help but feel you could be doing more for them,  "This is not good enough."

The MedTech looks at you nervously, "Commander, I assure you we are doing our very best to help the patient.  You need to under..."

You wave you hand at the MedTech, "No, no, not you and your team.  The patient, here, in MedBay One.  Move them to one of the private suites and assign a 24hr MedTech team to watch over them.  I want them up and about as soon as possible."

The MedTech activates the call button to summon a pair of orderlies to assist with the transfer, "Right away, Commander.  I'll get the patient situated in their room and alert you to any changes to their condition."

<color=#E62E00>[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] estimated time comatose: approximately 1-2 Weeks</color>
